name: Visual Studio Setup and Deployment Project
summary: Learn about .VDPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Setup and deployment projects are commonly built into .MSI or .EXE files, which can are used for software installation in Windows. VDPROJ files are saved in a text format and can be viewed with a text editor if needed.
NOTE: Previously, setup and deployment projects were saved with the .VDP extension.

description: Software development project created by Visual Studio, an application that allows developers to create Windows programs; stores project build settings and file references; often used for building and packaging Windows installation programs.
